attributes.action: Make all WW2 and Cold War defences listed buildings
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
There are loads of Pillboxes, road blocks and other sites from WW2, ROC posts from the cold war and other bunkers etc that are being lost to the nation due to demolishing or neglect.
I propose that all these structures be listed under the 'grade' listing scheme before these are lost to our heritage.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
